paragraphs.body: Tom Kane is a prominent voice actor with over twenty-five years of experience who is most widely known for his animated work. Notable roles he has played include Jedi Master Yoda and Admiral Yularen in Star Wars: The Clone Wars feature film and TV series, and The Chancellor in Tim Burton's 9. He is also a prominent video game voice actor, having played Gandalf and Professor Xavier, and has voiced lead characters in almost every Star Wars game ever made. In the arena of non-animation voice-over work, he has performed in movie trailers, TV promos and commercials. In addition, he has been the announcer for the AFI Life Achievement Awards show twice, as well as the 78th, 80th, and 83rd Academy Awards.
